Trigger An enemy within your reach leaves a square during a move action it's using.

Requirements You are wielding a melee weapon in two hands.

You swing your weapon at your foe, rebuffing them back. You attempt to @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.actionspf2e.Item.Shove] the triggering creature, ignoring the requirement that you have a hand free. Unless you critically succeed at your check, the creature continues its movement after the Shove.
